paragraphs.first: I am a passionate front-end developer from Denmark, currently based in Germany. I specialize in crafting efficient and engaging user interfaces that enhance the overall user experience.

skill.first: Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+), with a strong understanding of core concepts such as prototypes, closures, the event loop, and the DOM.
skill.second: Skilled in React, with hands-on experience building and maintaining React applications. Additionally, experienced with other component-based frameworks such as Svelte, Astro, and Gatsby.
skill.third: I have a strong sense of creating beautiful designs and extensive experience using Figma for design processes.
skill.fourth: Developed automated end-to-end tests to ensure software quality, reliability, and smooth functionality.
skill.fifth: Experienced in selector specificity, creating modern layouts using CSS Grid and Flexbox, and ensuring visual consistency across different devices and screen sizes.

professionalExperience.first: Maintained and extended a dynamic React application
professionalExperience.second: Created automated tests that enhanced software reliability, reduced downtime due to bugs, and improved overall development efficiency.

projectssection.sentenceguesser: Sentence Guesser works by taking an English sentence that you provide, translating it to German with DeepL, then returning it to you in the form of a fill-in-the-blanks exercise.
projectssection.guitarnotefinder: Another tool made for learning the fretboard of a guitar
projectssection.sortingvis: Tool I made as a part of a school exercise to visualize sorting algorithms. Supports Insertion Sort, Selection Sort and Bubble Sort
projectssection.fretworkout: Tool I made to help myself learn all the notes on a guitar's fretboard
projectssection.aleye: Website I helped making for the startup company Al-eye. The company is developing visual aids using augmented reality
projectssection.rockpaper: Game I made as part of a Frontendmentors.io challenge
projectssection.quiz: Quiz I made for Universit√§t Erfurt as a part of International Developmental Language Disorder Awareness Day
projectssection.portolio: The website you're on. Designed in Figma and made from the bottom up using GSAP for the animations.
